achievements.name: For the Glory
achievements.description: Diplo-annex a vassal.

achievements.name: That's a Grand Army
achievements.description: Build up your army to your country's maximum army forcelimit.

achievements.name: That's a Grand Navy
achievements.description: Build up your navy to your country's maximum navy forcelimit.

achievements.name: Defender of the Faith
achievements.description: Become Defender of the Faith.

achievements.name: Until death do us apart
achievements.description: Secure a Royal Marriage with another country.

achievements.name: That is mine!
achievements.description: Conquer a province.

achievements.name: Victorious!
achievements.description: Win a war.

achievements.name: The Emperors new clothes
achievements.description: Overthrow Austria and become the Emperor of the Holy Roman Empire.

achievements.name: Down Under
achievements.description: Have a colony in Australia.

achievements.name: Isn't this the way to India?
achievements.description: Discover the Americas as Castile or Spain.

achievements.name: Azur semé de lis or
achievements.description: Get all the French Cores as France.

achievements.name: Not so sad a state...
achievements.description: As Portugal, have a colony in Brazil and in Africa.

achievements.name: Seriously?!
achievements.description: Kill 10,000 men in one battle.

achievements.name: It's all about the money
achievements.description: Accumulate 3000 gold.

achievements.name: Respected
achievements.description: Have 100 prestige, 100 legitimacy and three stability.

achievements.name: True Catholic
achievements.description: Control three Cardinals.

achievements.name: Truly Divine Ruler
achievements.description: Get a 5/5/5 Ruler or higher.

achievements.name: Italian Ambition
achievements.description: Form Italy.

achievements.name: Cold War
achievements.description: Win a war without fighting a single battle.

achievements.name: Royal Authority
achievements.description: Install a union through a succession war.

achievements.name: Viva la Revolución!
achievements.description: Have rebels you support in another country enforce their demands.

achievements.name: Brothers in Arms
achievements.description: Win a war as a secondary participant.

achievements.name: No Pirates in my Caribbean
achievements.description: Own or have a subject own the entire Caribbean.

achievements.name: Master of India
achievements.description: Own and have cores on all of India as a European nation.

achievements.name: Sweden is not overpowered!
achievements.description: Own and have cores on the entire Baltic coastline as Sweden.

achievements.name: My armies are invincible!
achievements.description: Gain at least 7.0 land morale.

achievements.name: This navy can take it all
achievements.description: Gain at least 7.0 naval morale.

achievements.name: The pen is mightier than the sword
achievements.description: Have three unions at the same time as Austria or Austria-Hungary.

achievements.name: Traditional Player
achievements.description: More than 90 percent Naval and Army Tradition.

achievements.name: It's all about luck
achievements.description: Win a battle against a great leader, without a leader.

achievements.name: All belongs to Mother Russia
achievements.description: Start as a country of Russian culture and form Russia.

achievements.name: At every continent
achievements.description: Own one province on each continent.

achievements.name: Spain is the Emperor
achievements.description: Become the Emperor of the Holy Roman Empire as Spain.

achievements.name: An early Reich
achievements.description: Form Germany.

achievements.name: Poland can into space
achievements.description: As Poland, reach the maximum level in all technologies (32).

achievements.name: World Discoverer
achievements.description: Discover all non-wasteland land provinces.

achievements.name: The Chrysanthemum Throne
achievements.description: Unite Japan as a Daimyo.

achievements.name: Basileus
achievements.description: As Byzantium, restore the borders of the Eastern Roman Empire in the Balkans and Anatolia.

achievements.name: Aggressive Expander
achievements.description: Own 200 provinces.

achievements.name: A Kaiser not just in name
achievements.description: Form the Holy Roman Empire.

achievements.name: Norwegian Wood
achievements.description: Own or have a subject own all naval supplies provinces as Norway.

achievements.name: African Power
achievements.description: Own and have cores on all provinces in Africa as Kongo.

achievements.name: No Trail of Tears
achievements.description: Own and have cores on the Thirteen Colonies as Cherokee with all institutions embraced.

achievements.name: One Night in Paris
achievements.description: Start as England, own and have a core on Paris (do not form another country unless it's Great Britain or the Angevin Kingdom).

achievements.name: Definitely the Sultan of Rum
achievements.description: Own and have cores on Rome, Moscow and Istanbul as Ottomans or Rum.

achievements.name: Market Control
achievements.description: Be trade leader of seven different goods.

achievements.name: Ruina Imperii
achievements.description: Dismantle the Holy Roman Empire.

achievements.name: World Conqueror
achievements.description: Own or have a subject own the entire world.

achievements.name: The Three Mountains
achievements.description: Own or have a subject own the entire world as Ryukyu.

achievements.name: Jihad
achievements.description: As Najd, own 500 Sunni provinces.

achievements.name: Sunset Invasion
achievements.description: Own and have cores on Lisbon, Madrid, Paris, London, Amsterdam and Rome as the Aztecs.

achievements.name: Luck of the Irish
achievements.description: Own and have cores on the British Isles as an Irish nation.

achievements.name: Trade Hegemon
achievements.description: Starting as any European country, conquer and have cores on Aden, Hormoz and Malacca.

achievements.name: Winged Hussars
achievements.description: Have Winged Hussars as your active unit with more than +50% cavalry combat ability.

achievements.name: Grand Coalition
achievements.description: Join a coalition of more than 5 nations.

achievements.name: Double the Love
achievements.description: Start with no unions and get two at the same time.

achievements.name: Just a Little Patience
achievements.description: Play a campaign from 1444 until 1820.

achievements.name: Liberty or Death
achievements.description: Start as USA in 1776 bookmark and own all your cores while being at peace.

achievements.name: Nobody wants to die
achievements.description: Own Timbuktu as Songhai

achievements.name: Turning the Tide
achievements.description: Start as a Steppe Horde in 1444 and embrace all institutions.

achievements.name: In the Name of the Father
achievements.description: As an Orthodox country, have 100 Patriarch Authority.

achievements.name: The Rising Sun
achievements.description: Own and have cores on all of Japan as a European nation.

achievements.name: The Five Colonies
achievements.description: Have five colonial nations.

achievements.name: The Re-Reconquista
achievements.description: As Granada, form Andalusia and reconquer all of Iberia.

achievements.name: Turn the Table
achievements.description: As a colony, break free and vassalize your former overlord without forming any other nation.

achievements.name: The Great Khan
achievements.description: Starting as Mongolia or Great Horde, own or have a subject own the Chinese, Russian and Persian regions.

achievements.name: Four For Trade
achievements.description: Form four Trade Companies and get bonus merchants from all of them.

achievements.name: The Grand Armada
achievements.description: Have 500 heavy ships and no loans.

achievements.name: Je maintiendrai
achievements.description: Form the Netherlands as a minor nation starting with Dutch culture.

achievements.name: A Protected Market
achievements.description: Have 100% Mercantilism.

achievements.name: Queen of Mercury
achievements.description: As Kilwa, own and have cores on Zanzibar and Bombay (Thana).

achievements.name: A Pile of Gold
achievements.description: Own 10 provinces which produce gold.

achievements.name: Sons of Carthage
achievements.description: As Tunisia, own and have cores on Sicily, Sardinia, the Balearic Islands, the coast of Algiers and the southern coast of Spain.

achievements.name: The Princess is in this Castle
achievements.description: As a country that does not start with a female heir, have a female heir while having a Castle in your capital (more advanced fort buildings do not count).

achievements.name: Electable!
achievements.description: Become an elector in the HRE as a country which does not start as elector.

achievements.name: Vasa or Wettin?
achievements.description: Get a ruler of your dynasty on the throne of Poland or the Commonwealth while they are an elective monarchy.

achievements.name: Sinaasappel!
achievements.description: Get Orangists in power with 100% Republican Tradition, and owning a province in China.

achievements.name: One King to Rule!
achievements.description: As Poland, become an absolutist monarchy, abolishing the Sejm.

achievements.name: Venetian Sea
achievements.description: Have a 75% Trade share in both the Alexandria and Constantinople nodes as Venice, owning less than 10 cities.

achievements.name: The Iron Price
achievements.description: Restore the Danelaw region to Danish rule, and make it Danish culture.

achievements.name: A Manchurian Candidate
achievements.description: Start as one of the Jurchen tribes and form Qing.

achievements.name: Center of Attention
achievements.description: Own both a Protestant and a Reformed Center of Reformation.

achievements.name: Total Control
achievements.description: Own 100 or more provinces with no local autonomy or unrest.

achievements.name: This Revolution Was Crushed
achievements.description: In a war against the target of the Revolution, control their capital and have at least 99% war score.

achievements.name: Land of Eastern Jade
achievements.description: Own a core province in the Mexico region as a Buddhist country.

achievements.name: That's a Silk Road
achievements.description: Own or have a subject own all provinces in the world producing silk.

achievements.name: My True Friend
achievements.description: Go to war in support of a rebel faction and win, enforcing their demands.

achievements.name: Marshy March
achievements.description: Have a march with at least two marsh provinces.

achievements.name: Shahanshah
achievements.description: Start as Ardabil and form Persia or Eranshahr.

achievements.name: Die Please Die
achievements.description: Have a ruler with 1 or lower in all three categories who is over the age of 70.

achievements.name: Holy Trinity
achievements.description: As the Papacy, own Jerusalem and have Livonian Order, Teutonic Order and The Knights as Marches.

achievements.name: Switzerlake
achievements.description: Own 99 provinces as Switzerland while owning no ports.

achievements.name: King of Jerusalem
achievements.description: Form the Kingdom of Jerusalem as Cyprus or The Knights.

achievements.name: Krabater
achievements.description: Form the nation of Croatia and station a unit of cavalry in Stockholm.

achievements.name: Lion of the North
achievements.description: Start as Sweden and lead the Protestant League to victory against the Emperor.

achievements.name: Guarantor of Peace
achievements.description: Guarantee the Independence of France, The Ottoman Empire and Russia.

achievements.name: Foremost Servitor of Jagannath
achievements.description: Start as Orissa and own or have a subject own all tropical wood provinces.

achievements.name: Bengal Tiger
achievements.description: Start as Bengal and own Samarkand as a core province.

achievements.name: Prester John
achievements.description: Starting as Ethiopia, own and have cores on Alexandria, Antioch and Constantinople as a Coptic country.

achievements.name: Auld Alliance Reversed
achievements.description: As Scotland, have France as a vassal (do not form Great Britain).

achievements.name: Gothic Invasion
achievements.description: Start as Theodoro and conquer all Germanic culture provinces in Europe.

achievements.name: Kow-Tow
achievements.description: As Ming, have a subject from each religion group.

achievements.name: Barbarossa
achievements.description: As a Maghrebi nation, have 500 light ships privateering at the same time.

achievements.name: Georgia on my Mind
achievements.description: Fully own all three Georgias.

achievements.name: Albania or Iberia
achievements.description: As Albania, own or have a subject own Iberia and the Caucasus.

achievements.name: The Spice Must Flow
achievements.description: Form the nation of Malaya.

achievements.name: Raja of the Rajput Reich
achievements.description: Conquer all of Germany as Nagaur.

achievements.name: The Sun Never Sets on the Indian Empire
achievements.description: Form Hindustan or Bharat and own or have a subject own Cape, London, Hong Kong (Canton) and Ottawa (Kichessipirini).

achievements.name: Over a Thousand!
achievements.description: Own 1001 provinces directly.

achievements.name: Dracula's Revenge
achievements.description: Start as Wallachia or Moldavia, form Romania and own or have a subject own all of the Balkans.

achievements.name: Arabian Coffee
achievements.description: Form Arabia and be the nation producing the most coffee in the world.

achievements.name: Even Better than Piet Heyn
achievements.description: Gain over 100 gold from privateering a single treasure fleet.

achievements.name: A Sun God
achievements.description: Form Inca, embrace all Institutions and own all of South America as core provinces.

achievements.name: On the Edge of Madness
achievements.description: As Aztecs, reach 95 Doom, then go 20 years without Doom hitting 100.

achievements.name: Magellan’s Voyage
achievements.description: Make the first circumnavigation.

achievements.name: Imperio español
achievements.description: As Spain have Mexico, Panama, Havana, Cuzco in colonial Nations under you.

achievements.name: Blockader
achievements.description: Blockade at least 10 ports of one enemy.

achievements.name: This is Persia!
achievements.description: Form Persia or Eranshahr, and own Egypt, Anatolia and Greece as core provinces.

achievements.name: Kirishitan Japan
achievements.description: Start as a Japanese Daimyo, convert yourself and all of Japan to Christianity.

achievements.name: Hessian Mercenaries
achievements.description: As Hesse, have at least 50 regiments of mercenaries and no loans.

achievements.name: Baltic Crusader
achievements.description: As Teutonic Order or Livonian Order, own all of Russia as core provinces and convert it to Catholic.

achievements.name: Neither Holy, Nor German
achievements.description: Have 7 Free Cities in the Empire, none of which is of a Germanic culture.

achievements.name: Colonial Management
achievements.description: Have 3 colonial governors that were directly appointed by you at the same time.

achievements.name: Voting Streak
achievements.description: Successfully pass 11 issues in a row in Parliament.

achievements.name: An Industrial Evolution
achievements.description: As Great Britain, own all of England as core provinces and have at least 25 development in each province there.

achievements.name: City of Cities
achievements.description: Own a core province with at least 60 development.

achievements.name: One Family to Rule them All
achievements.description: Have your dynasty on 8 thrones at the same time. Client states do not count.

achievements.name: This is My Faith
achievements.description: Convert to Protestantism and unlock 3 Aspects of Faith.

achievements.name: Bleed Them Dry
achievements.description: Have 10 different War Reparations being paid to you at the same time.

achievements.name: Subsidize my Love
achievements.description: Subsidize 3 different allies at least 50% of their monthly income without running a deficit.

achievements.name: Take that, von Habsburgs!
achievements.description: Starting as Hungary, own all of Austria as core provinces.

achievements.name: The White Elephant
achievements.description: As Ayutthaya, own all of Indochina and Burma as core provinces.

achievements.name: The Buddhists Strike Back
achievements.description: As Kotte or Kandy, own all of India and convert it to Theravada Buddhism.

achievements.name: Better than Napoleon
achievements.description: As France, own Vienna, Berlin and Moscow as core provinces.

achievements.name: Big Blue Blob
achievements.description: As France, hold 100 European core provinces before 1500.

achievements.name: Full House
achievements.description: Have 3 Vassals and 2 Marches at the same time.

achievements.name: Black Jack
achievements.description: Have at least 21 different subjects with 5 cities each and without any subject having 50% or more Liberty Desire. Trade Companies do not count.

achievements.name: A Decent Reserve
achievements.description: Have a maximum manpower of at least 1 million.

achievements.name: The Six Nations
achievements.description: Form a Federation of at least six nations as the Iroquois.

achievements.name: The Bohemians
achievements.description: As Bohemia, own Dublin as a core province.

achievements.name: Komnenoi Empire
achievements.description: As Trebizond, have the Empire government rank.

achievements.name: Lucky Lucca
achievements.description: As Lucca, own Lucknow!

achievements.name: A Fine Goosestep
achievements.description: Form Prussia and have at least 125% Discipline.

achievements.name: Meissner Porcelain
achievements.description: As Saxony, own or have a subject own all Chinaware provinces in the world.

achievements.name: All Your Trade Are Belong to Us
achievements.description: Have the highest trade power in Genoa, Venice and English Channel while having an income of at least 300 ducats per month.

achievements.name: Grand Duchy
achievements.description: Starting as a Duchy, have 1000 development without upgrading your government rank.

achievements.name: Rags and Riches
achievements.description: Have the highest income in the world while neither owning nor starting with a province with a development level higher than 10.

achievements.name: Strait Talk
achievements.description: As Hormuz, have at least 10 diplomatic reputation

achievements.name: Academical
achievements.description: As Athens, own 50 universities.

achievements.name: One Faith
achievements.description: Have all non-wasteland land provinces in the world be of your religion.

achievements.name: Dar al-Islam
achievements.description: Unify Islam under your rule.

achievements.name: The Uncommonwealth
achievements.description: As Lithuania, become The Commonwealth.

achievements.name: The Burgundian Conquest
achievements.description: As Burgundy, own the Low Countries region as core provinces and have France and Austria as your subjects.

achievements.name: The Third Way
achievements.description: Start as an Ibadi nation and eliminate all rival schools of Islam (do not convert to another religion).

achievements.name: Back to the Piast
achievements.description: As Mazovia, Glogow or Opole, form the nation of Poland.

achievements.name: Great Perm
achievements.description: As Perm, own or have a subject own the Russian, Siberian, Scandinavian, Canadian, Hudson Bay and Cascadian Regions.

achievements.name: Lazarus
achievements.description: As Serbia, own the entire Balkans as core provinces.

achievements.name: Frozen Assets
achievements.description: Start as Novgorod and control 90% of the trade power in the White Sea trade node while it is the highest valued trade node in the world.

achievements.name: Tatarstan
achievements.description: As Kazan or Nogai, own all Tatar culture group lands.

achievements.name: Terra Mariana
achievements.description: As Riga, own or have a subject own the Baltic region.

achievements.name: Blood for the Sky God!
achievements.description: As a Tengri nation, have Nahuatl as your syncretic faith.

achievements.name: Pyramid of Skulls
achievements.description: As a Steppe Horde, raze a province with at least 30 development.

achievements.name: Trustworthy
achievements.description: Have five allies with 100 trust towards you each.

achievements.name: The Continuation of Diplomacy
achievements.description: Successfully use Threaten War to gain a province from another nation.

achievements.name: Factionalism
achievements.description: Have 3 different estates in your country with at least 70% influence each.

achievements.name: From Humble Origins
achievements.description: Starting as a custom nation with no more than 50 points, have at least 2000 total development.

achievements.name: Ideas Guy
achievements.description: Starting as a custom nation with the full 800 points but no more than 3 total development, have a monthly income of at least 500 ducats.

achievements.name: For Odin!
achievements.description: Starting as a Norse custom nation with no more than 200 points and a maximum of 5 provinces, own & core Scandinavia and the British Isles and convert it all to Norse.

achievements.name: Rekindling the Flames
achievements.description: Starting as a Zoroastrian custom nation with no more than 200 points and a maximum of 5 provinces, rekindle the royal fires.

achievements.name: First Come, First Serve
achievements.description: Starting as a Western technology custom nation in North America or South America with no more than 200 points, unite the two continents.

achievements.name: Mare Nostrum
achievements.description: Restore the Roman Empire and own the entire Mediterranean and Black Sea coast lines.

achievements.name: Kuban Cigars
achievements.description: As Kuba, own or have a subject own Havana and be the world’s leading producer of Tobacco.

achievements.name: Kushite Restoration
achievements.description: As a Nubian culture nation, own or have a non-Tributary subject own the entire Egyptian region.

achievements.name: The Fezzan Corridors
achievements.description: As Fezzan, control at least 90% of the trade power in Tunis, Katsina, Safi and Timbuktu.

achievements.name: Victorian Three
achievements.description: As Busoga, Buganda or Karagwe, reach administrative, diplomatic and military technology level 32.

achievements.name: The Animal Kingdom
achievements.description: As Manipur, unite the Bengal region and convert it to Animism.

achievements.name: Golden Horn
achievements.description: As a Somali nation, fully own the Horn of Africa region and have a monthly gold income of at least 10 ducats.

achievements.name: Kinslayer
achievements.description: As Tver, Yaroslavl, Ryazan, Beloozero, Rostov or Odoyev, eliminate all other Rurikovich nations without changing your ruling dynasty.

achievements.name: Choson One
achievements.description: As Korea, own or have a subject own all Shinto, Confucian and Buddhist provinces in the world.

achievements.name: Sailor Mon
achievements.description: As Pegu, have at least 100,000 sailors.

achievements.name: Networking
achievements.description: Have 100 point spy networks in 3 Rival nations.

achievements.name: The White Company
achievements.description: Join a war on the other side of someone to whom you have rented condottieri.

achievements.name: Time Bandit
achievements.description: Successfully steal a map from another nation.

achievements.name: With a little help..
achievements.description: As Ragusa, lead a Trade League of at least 5 nations and guarantee the Ottomans’ independence.

achievements.name: Just Resting In My Account
achievements.description: Corrupt the officials in a Rival country.

achievements.name: We bled for this
achievements.description: Win a war with at least one million dead on both sides.

achievements.name: Pick Your Poison
achievements.description: As Kaffa, develop in Cafa while a subject of yours owns it.

achievements.name: Not just Pizza
achievements.description: Become a Great Power as Naples.

achievements.name: All That's Thine Shall Be Mine
achievements.description: As a Greedy ruler, take all of a nation’s ducats in a peace deal.

achievements.name: A Blessed Nation
achievements.description: As a Coptic Nation, gain all 5 Blessings.

achievements.name: Queen of Conquest
achievements.description: Conquer land while in a Queen Regency.

achievements.name: AAA Credit
achievements.description: As a Great Power, take on over 1,000 ducats of another nation’s debt.

achievements.name: Hoarder
achievements.description: As a Fetishist nation, have 13 available Cults.

achievements.name: Gentle Persuasion
achievements.description: Have a Siege Specialist general win a siege in a province with a fort.

achievements.name: Combined Arms
achievements.description: Have both an Admiral and a General with a trait.

achievements.name: Cities of Cibola
achievements.description: As a Nation that has Pueblo as primary culture, own at least 7 provinces with 10 development each.

achievements.name: Turkish Delight
achievements.description: Start as Candar and own 20 Sugar provinces between you and your subjects.

achievements.name: Baa Baa Black Sheep
achievements.description: As Qara Qoyunlu become the leading producer of wool.

achievements.name: Fanatic Collectivist
achievements.description: Own all Institution Origin provinces.

achievements.name: Core-fu
achievements.description: Force a nation to revoke 5 cores in one peace deal as Corfu.

achievements.name: Rozwi Empire
achievements.description: Starting as Butua, conquer Mutapa (Zimbabwe and Lower Zambezi areas).

achievements.name: The Sudanese Expedition
achievements.description: Starting as Morocco, conquer the Niger and Sahel Regions.

achievements.name: A tale of two Families
achievements.description: Starting as Vijayanagar or Bahmanis conquer the other’s capital and have them not exist.

achievements.name: Abu Bakr II’s Ambition
achievements.description: Start as Mali and have 4 Colonial Subjects in South America.

achievements.name: Consulate of the Sea
achievements.description: As Aragon conquer all Mediterranean Centers of Trade.

achievements.name: Live Long and Prosper
achievements.description: Have 30 states with prosperity at the same time as you have a 70 year old ruler.

achievements.name: Tear Down This Wall
achievements.description: Use Artillery Barrage on Berlin.

achievements.name: A Golden Empire
achievements.description: Enact a Golden Age as an Empire.

achievements.name: Cherrypicking
achievements.description: Conscript a 3 star general from a Daimyo Subject.

achievements.name: These Banners need a Saga
achievements.description: Starting as a Jurchen nation, have 100 regiments of Banners raised at the same time.

achievements.name: Sweet Harmony
achievements.description: Harmonize 7 religions as Confucian.

achievements.name: Sakoku Law
achievements.description: Go full isolationist in 6 Incidents.

achievements.name: Absolutely
achievements.description: Gain 100 Absolutism.

achievements.name: Carthago Delenda Est
achievements.description: As an Italian culture nation, make sure entire Tunis Area is at 100 devastation.

achievements.name: Qing of China
achievements.description: Become Chinese Emperor as Qing and own all of China.

achievements.name: Three Trivial Tributary Tribes
achievements.description: Have 3 Tribal States as Tributaries.

achievements.name: Made in Japan
achievements.description: Embrace "manufactories" institution as Japan by 1655.

achievements.name: The First Toungoo Empire
achievements.description: As Taungu, unite the Burman culture group by 1500.

achievements.name: Disciples of Enlightenment
achievements.description: Starting as Dai Viet, have 10 nations follow the Mahayana Faith by 1500.

achievements.name: Where the heart is
achievements.description: As Dahomey, force all non-Fetishist nations out of Niger and Sahel by 1500.

achievements.name: Rise of the White Sheep
achievements.description: As Aq Qoyunlu, own Tabriz and have Qara Qoyunlu not exist by 1478.

achievements.name: I’ll graze my horse here.. And here…
achievements.description: As a Horde, own over 200 provinces producing grain.

achievements.name: Gold Rush
achievements.description: Reform the Golden Horde before 1500.

achievements.name: The Navigator
achievements.description: As Portugal, own provinces in Africa, India and Indonesia before 1500.

achievements.name: Turtles all the way down
achievements.description: As Korea get 135% Ship Durability.

achievements.name: Dovmont's Own
achievements.description: Starting as Pskov, have 100 standing Streltsy units

achievements.name: Redecorating
achievements.description: Starting as an Orthodox Nation, Consecrate Metropolitan in Roma

achievements.name: Breaking the Yoke
achievements.description: As Ryazan, own Saratov, Crimea and Kazan while being independent

achievements.name: Back in Control
achievements.description: Form Yuan and be the only nation holding land in China

achievements.name: Mass Production
achievements.description: Starting as Odoyev, own one of every manufactory

achievements.name: Relentless Push East
achievements.description: Starting as a Russian nation, By 1600 own the East Siberian Coastline

achievements.name: Laughingstock
achievements.description: Own the provinces of Haha, Hehe and Lolland

achievements.name: Lessons of Hemmingstedt
achievements.description: As Dithmarschen, hold the provinces of Sjaelland and Holland while Denmark do not exist

achievements.name: It's All Greek To Me
achievements.description: Form Greece and own and have cores on Zeta, Thatta, Lamba, and Roh

achievements.name: The 52 Garhs
achievements.description: As Garhwal own and maintain 52 forts without going into debt

achievements.name: Bunte Kuh
achievements.description: As Hamburg, trade in both Gems and Livestock.

achievements.name: Good King René
achievements.description: Start as Provence, form the Kingdom of Jerusalem.

achievements.name: Saladin's Legacy
achievements.description: Playing as Hisn Kayfa, reforge the Ayyubid Empire.

achievements.name: Avar Khaganate
achievements.description: Achieve Empire rank and conquer Hungary as Avaria.

achievements.name: Protect the Secret
achievements.description: As Yemen, prevent any European Nation from owning a Coffee-producing province in the Old World until 1700.

achievements.name: Great Moravia
achievements.description: Restore the Great Moravian borders as Nitra or Moravia.

achievements.name: A Hero’s Welcome
achievements.description: Starting as Karaman, form the Sultanate of Rum

achievements.name: David the Builder
achievements.description: As Georgia have no free building slots in any owned province.

achievements.name: Voltaire's Nightmare
achievements.description: Have at least 100 countries in the HRE.

achievements.name: Pandya Empire
achievements.description: Starting as Madurai, conquer the Pandya Territories.

achievements.name: The Prince of Egypt
achievements.description: Starting as Florence, form Egypt.

achievements.name: Around the World in 80 Years
achievements.description: Starting as a Custom Nation of up to 400 points in the British Region, own New York, San Francisco, Suez, Bombay, Calcutta, Hong Kong and Yokohama by 1524.11.11.

achievements.name: Hard Bargaining
achievements.description: As Defender of a Muslim Faith, propagate your religion in The Moluccas through trade to convert 5 provinces.

achievements.name: Early-Modern Warfare
achievements.description: Have 100 regiments at 100% Army Drill.

achievements.name: Sworn Fealty
achievements.description: Starting as an Arabian Tribal Federation, unite Arabia and have maximum Tribal Allegiance.

achievements.name: Parisian Pasha
achievements.description: Assign Pasha to Paris.

achievements.name: Multiculturalism
achievements.description: Have 4 different Cultures and 4 different religions represented in your court.

achievements.name: Narcissism
achievements.description: Name a general after yourself and lead your army to victory.

achievements.name: The Levant Turnabout
achievements.description: As the Mamluks, have 100 Army Professionalism and annex the Ottomans.

achievements.name: Cowardly Tactics
achievements.description: Have a fort and a supply depot in a mountainous province producing livestock.

achievements.name: Home and Away
achievements.description: As Wales, hold Cardiff, Dublin, Edinburgh, Rome, Paris and London.

achievements.name: Sun Invasion
achievements.description: As the Madyas, own and have cores on Tepeacac, Mexico, Tullucan and Huastec.

achievements.name: Sleepless in Seattle
achievements.description: Own 10 Coffee producing provinces, and have your capital in Salish.

achievements.name: Philippine Tiger
achievements.description: As Cebu, recreate the Chola Empire.

achievements.name: Empire of Mann
achievements.description: As Mann, conquer all Islands in the world.

achievements.name: Dude, Where's my Boat?
achievements.description: Capture 20 boats with the Boarding Naval Doctrine.

achievements.name: Bright Spark
achievements.description: Have 50 Innovativeness.

achievements.name: Anglophile
achievements.description: Complete all English and British missions.

achievements.name: Industrial Powerhouse
achievements.description: Have 10 furnaces built in your nation.

achievements.name: Chop Chop
achievements.description: With only one Monarch, have six different Consorts.

achievements.name: Mewar Never Changes
achievements.description: Complete the Mewar Mission Tree.

achievements.name: Fine Financials
achievements.description: Own Eight level 3 Centres of Trade.

achievements.name: The Coin is Stronger than the Sword
achievements.description: Charter Company from an Indian nation.

achievements.name: Sweet Home Qaraqorum
achievements.description: As the Mughals assimilate Mongolian culture.

achievements.name: The Ostenders
achievements.description: As Austria or AH have the District and Military Administration investments in the West Bengal area.

achievements.name: Ganges Khan
achievements.description: Start as Tribal nation in India and become a Steppe Horde.

achievements.name: Foul Mouthed
achievements.description: Scornfully insult 10 nations that border you.

achievements.name: Populists in Government
achievements.description: Switch government type through government reforms.

achievements.name: Maharana Pratap
achievements.description: Start as Mewar and field an army of 20 Rajput regiments.

achievements.name: Eat your Greens
achievements.description: Control all Grasslands in Asia as Kale before the age of Absolutism.

achievements.name: Emperor of Hindustan
achievements.description: Starting as Delhi, Restore their Empire's borders.

achievements.name: Tiger of Mysore
achievements.description: Starting as Mysore, Conquer the Deccan and Coromandel Regions.

achievements.name: True Heir of Timur
achievements.description: Starting as a Timurid subject, form the Mughals and conquer India by 1550.

achievements.name: Østindisk Kompagni Te
achievements.description: As Denmark establish Trade company and have at least 10% Tea market share.

achievements.name: Sikh Pun
achievements.description: Convert to Sikhism and form the nation of Punjab.

achievements.name: Pirate Bay of Janjira
achievements.description: Have more than 50% Privateering power in the Gujarat trade node

achievements.name: Never say Nevers
achievements.description: As Nevers, own the entire France region as core provinces.

achievements.name: Forgive me, for I have Sindh
achievements.description: Become Christian as Sindh.

achievements.name: Cotton Kandy
achievements.description: As Kandy be production leader in Cotton.

achievements.name: The Pheasant Strut
achievements.description: As Gorkha form Nepal and defeat Prussia with at least 100,000 Prussian casualties in a war (both have to be primary targets of war).

achievements.name: Trophy Hunter
achievements.description: Capture an enemy flagship.

achievements.name: Yarr Harr a Pirate's Life For Me
achievements.description: Choose to play as New Providence and conquer all of Caribbeans.

achievements.name: Why is the Rûm gone!?
achievements.description: As Asturias, establish an Order in Rum.

achievements.name: You Get A New Home, And You Get A New Home
achievements.description: Expel 5 different minorities to your colonies.

achievements.name: Forever Golden
achievements.description: Complete the Spanish Mission Tree.

achievements.name: Basque in Glory
achievements.description: Starting as Navarra, ensure that most of Iberia is Basque culture before the Age of Absolutism.

achievements.name: An Unlikely Candidate
achievements.description: Starting as Mzab, Touggourt or Djerid, reform Al-Andalus.

achievements.name: Spanish Fly
achievements.description: Starting as Offaly, secure a Personal Union over an Iberian nation.

achievements.name: The League of Mayapan
achievements.description: Starting as Huastec, form Maya.

achievements.name: Where Am I?
achievements.description: As a New World native with Random New World active, explore the entire New World.

achievements.name: AEIOU
achievements.description: Complete the Austrian mission tree.

achievements.name: Napoleon’s Ambition
achievements.description: As Revolutionary France, spread the Revolution to 10 countries.

achievements.name: Everything's Coming Up Mulhouse
achievements.description: Starting as Mulhouse, become Emperor of the HRE and completely decentralize the Empire.

achievements.name: Global Hegemony
achievements.description: Reach 100% Strength as any type of Hegemon.

achievements.name: God Tier
achievements.description: Become a Tier 5 Defender of the Faith as a nation that is neither Catholic nor Sunni.

achievements.name: Spaghetti Western
achievements.description: Starting as Bologna, become Mexico or Texas.

achievements.name: Don’t be Cilli
achievements.description: Starting as Cilli, form another nation.

achievements.name: Inner Turmoil
achievements.description: Starting as The Isles, own 20 provinces by 1500, none of which are on Islands.

achievements.name: Stern des Südens
achievements.description: Form Bavaria starting as München and have your Subject Bremen own Werder.

achievements.name: Kingdom of God
achievements.description: Starting as the Papal State, become the Kingdom of God

achievements.name: Stiff Upper Lippe
achievements.description: As Lippe, own all of the British Isles.

achievements.name: On the Rhodes Again
achievements.description: Starting as The Knights, conquer and core Constantinople, Jerusalem and Antioch.

achievements.name: Czechs and Balances
achievements.description: Starting as Bohemia, grant at least two privileges to each estate while having at least 50% Crown Land.

achievements.name: Mary of Lotharingia
achievements.description: Starting as Burgundy, form Lotharingia and have a female ruler named Marie.

achievements.name: Holiest Roman Empire
achievements.description: As either the Papal States or the Emperor, have the Papal States as an Elector while the HRE is officially Catholic.

achievements.name: Wonderful
achievements.description: Own 8 different monuments on tier 3.

achievements.name: Spice Girls
achievements.description: Having a female ruler, have active trading bonuses for Cloves, Spices, Salt and Sugar.

achievements.name: To the Bone
achievements.description: As Bone, use pillage capital at least 7 times.

achievements.name: Keep the Flame Burning
achievements.description: As a Zoroastrian nation, own all Religious Centers and Monument Baku Ateshgah on tier 3.

achievements.name: New, New Deli
achievements.description: As Deli, have your capital in the Delhi province.

achievements.name: The Power of Three
achievements.description: Own a Crown Colony, a Self-Governing Colony and a Private Enterprise.

achievements.name: Quizquiz Pro Quo
achievements.description: As Quizquiz, have your capital in the Anjou province.

achievements.name: That's No Mon
achievements.description: As Pegu, own at least 50 provinces that are not of the Mon culture.

achievements.name: Mansa Musa
achievements.description: As Mali, give 10k ducats away to another great power without having a single loan or being bankrupt.

achievements.name: Ultimate Military
achievements.description: As Songhai, have Prussia and Nepal as marches!

achievements.name: Golden Wind
achievements.description: As Air, make 50 ducats profit per month and have 50% of your income made through gold provinces.

achievements.name: Fugger Banking
achievements.description: As Augsburg, subsidize 3 Great Powers 20% of their income while having less than 20 provinces.

achievements.name: Where are the penguins?
achievements.description: As a Malagasy country, unite Madagascar and hold all the most southern provinces of the world.

achievements.name: This is fine
achievements.description: Have at least +10 Global Unrest and be in a winning coalition war, which was targeted against you.

achievements.name: KHAAAAAAN
achievements.description: Restore the Mongol Empire before the Age of Absolutism.

achievements.name: Knights of the Caribbean
achievements.description: Starting as the Knights, own the Caribbean and every island in the Mediterranean. (Colonies are NOT allowed)

achievements.name: Australia-Hungary
achievements.description: Starting as an Australian tribe unite Australia and subjugate Hungary.

achievements.name: Shemot is Not
achievements.description: As a Jewish nation, convert all of Egypt to Jewish while having the Jewish Community Aspect active.

achievements.name: One nation to rule them all
achievements.description: As Saruhan, have at least 9 loyal vassals with at least 100 development each.

achievements.name: Swahili Persuasion
achievements.description: As Kilwa, convert all of the Moluccas and Indonesia.

achievements.name: I don't like sand
achievements.description: Have the most development while owning no province with terrain other than desert or coastal desert.

achievements.name: Surfing USA
achievements.description: Form the USA as Hawaii.

achievements.name: Imposter Syndrome
achievements.description: As Sus, have three countries hostile to you (less than 0 opinion) after they discovered your spy.

achievements.name: Atwix Legacy
achievements.description: Have 10 personal unions at the same time.

achievements.name: Brick by Brick
achievements.description: Starting as Denmark, enact the Unified Kalmar Monarchy government reform and own the entire Scandinavian region as your cores.

achievements.name: Super Trooper
achievements.description: Starting as Sweden, enact the Allotment System government reform, have 80 regiments of Carolean raised at the same time with at least +40% infantry combat ability.

achievements.name: Assembly Instructions Needed
achievements.description: Form Scandinavia and revoke the privilegia of the Holy Roman Empire while being the Emperor.

achievements.name: Let It Go!
achievements.description: Starting as Norway, have your capital in the Canada region while not owning any province in Scandinavia and not playing as a released subject.

achievements.name: Holy Horder
achievements.description: Starting as the Teutonic Order, form the Mongol Empire while have the Holy Horde government reform enacted.

achievements.name: For the Emperor!
achievements.description: Form Prussia or Germany, have the Empire government rank and 40.000 Marines raised at the same time.

achievements.name: The Freest Man in the World
achievements.description: Ensure that no colonized province in the world produces slaves while having the War Against the World Doctrine government reform enacted.

achievements.name: Crossing the Finnish Line
achievements.description: Release and play as Finland in 1444 and have a direct land connection to the Cape while your capital is in Nyland/Uusimaa.

achievements.name: Purify the Temple
achievements.description: Starting as Riga, enact the Salvific Plutocracy government reform and raid the heretic church of Rome.

achievements.name: Almost Prussian Blue
achievements.description: Starting as the Livonian Order, form Livonia and own the territory of the North German Confederation as core provinces.

achievements.name: Hanukkah Mutapa
achievements.description: Starting as Mutapa, convert to Judaism and celebrate a festival.

achievements.name: From Frankfurt to the Andes
achievements.description: Starting as Frankfurt, form Jerusalem, and then form the Inca while owning Mallorca.

achievements.name: Mehmet's Ambition
achievements.description: Starting as The Ottomans, own or have Core Eyalets own all the provinces required to form the Roman Empire before 1500.

achievements.name: Triple the Rome
achievements.description: As Russia, be the Emperor of China and the HRE.

achievements.name: No Country for Old Tercios
achievements.description: As Spain have Reformed Tercios, 33 Tercio Units, and control 3 Great Power capitals at the same time

achievements.name: All Blue
achievements.description: As Portugal, all of Europe is owned by you or blue European countries that exist in 1444.

achievements.name: Stardust Crusaders
achievements.description: As Japan have the Land of the Christian Sun reform while Palestine and Cairo are Christian under us.

achievements.name: Copium Wars
achievements.description: Starting and playing as Ming, own the Britain region.

achievements.name: Brentry
achievements.description: Starting as England, form the Angevin Kingdom and enact all the Acts of Crown parliamentary issues.

achievements.name: The Reapers
achievements.description: Starting as Aragon, be a Peasant Republic and have Madrid and Paris owned by any Peasant Republic.

achievements.name: King of Kings
achievements.description: Complete the Persian mission tree.

achievements.name: Restore the Pentarchy
achievements.description: Starting as Byzantium, own Rome, Constantinople, Alexandria, Antioch, and Jerusalem while being Orthodox.

achievements.name: Mets Hayk
achievements.description: Starting as Karabakh, own, core, and convert to Coptic the borders of Great Armenia.

achievements.name: Desert Power
achievements.description: Starting as an Arabian Tribe, have the Oasis privilege enacted, and more than 1000 development in the Arabian Region.

achievements.name: Breadbasket of the World
achievements.description: As the Mamluks, export grain to every continent at least once.

achievements.name: Truly Good Maaaaa-tch
achievements.description: Starting as either Aq Qoyunlu or Qara Qoyunlu, have a royal marriage and an alliance with Ramazan.

achievements.name: The Last Crusade
achievements.description: Starting as Byzantium, control Venezia, and make sure that the country Venice doesn't exist.

achievements.name: Legacy of Saint George
achievements.description: As Georgia, have Genoa, Aragon, England, and Trier as vassals, while controlling Wales.

achievements.name: The Zoro-Austrians
achievements.description: Starting as Austria, convert to Zoroastrianism, and complete the Persian Zoroastrian missions.

achievements.name: It's all coming together
achievements.description: Complete the Incan mission tree (Sunset invasion missions excluded).

achievements.name: Doge Coins
achievements.description: Starting as Venice, become the Economic Hegemon.

achievements.name: Veritas Vincit
achievements.description: Starting as Bohemia, make Hussite the official faith of the Empire and become the Emperor.

achievements.name: The Eagle flies alone
achievements.description: Starting as Hisn Kayfa, reach a forcelimit of 500k.

achievements.name: Mayapahit?
achievements.description: Starting as any Mayan country, form Maya and own or have a subject own the island of Java.

achievements.name: There Khan only be one!
achievements.description: Starting as a Steppe Horde, ensure there exists no other horde than you on the world.

achievements.name: Baborg
achievements.description: As the Mughals, assimilate at least 12 culture groups.

achievements.name: Get out of my swamp!
achievements.description: As the Netherlands, own all of the Low Countries and have 50% or more Fort Defense.

achievements.name: Timurizz
achievements.description: Starting as the Timurids, have 75 prestige, and 5 allies with 100 Trust and 150 opinion

achievements.name: The Hungarian Games
achievements.description: Starting as Hungary, win 23 battles with the Black Army against at least 12 different countries.
